content: हृदयं {@--1@} The heart, soul, mind; हृदये दिग्धशरैरिवाहतः <ls>Ku. 4. 25</ls>; so अयोहृदयः <ls>R. 9. 9</ls>; पाषाणहृदय &c. {@--2@} The bosom, chest, breast; बाणभिन्नहृदया निपेतुषी <ls>R. 11. 19.</ls> {@--3@} Love, affection. {@--4@} The interior or essence of anything. {@--5@} The secret science; अश्व°, अक्ष° &c. {@--6@} True or divine knowledge. {@--7@} The Veda.
